body: Is there any mod that shows the kd that you have in a match?
body_tagged: Is there any mod that shows the kd that you have in a match?
title: KDR Mod?

replies.body:
If you're talking about server-side mods, I'd love for this to happen.
But if you're talking about client-side mods, that just can't happen because you'd have to tie into the Avicus database and I doubt IvyStudios will let anyone do that :l
replies.body_tagged:
If you're talking about server-side mods, I'd love for this to happen.
But if you're talking about client-side mods, that just can't happen because you'd have to tie into the Avicus database and I doubt IvyStudios will let anyone do that :l

replies.body: you say like a plugin? yeah it will be nice, or just a command at the end of the match
replies.body_tagged: you say like a plugin? yeah it will be nice, or just a command at the end of the match

replies.body: It could count your kills and deaths since you logged in it wouldnt be too hard
replies.body_tagged: It could count your kills and deaths since you logged in it wouldnt be too hard

replies.body: It'd be possible I imagine, the mod would open page source, and stream the part that it needs onto your screen ingame.
replies.body_tagged: It'd be possible I imagine, the mod would open page source, and stream the part that it needs onto your screen ingame.

replies.body:
I'd like a mod with a similar GUI like the 5zig pvp mod

On the top left corner:

--Avicus Mod v1.0--
[Player] 1Theodore1
[Kills] 30,000
[K/D] 2.1
[PvP K/D] 2.2                                                    etc. That would be great :D

replies.body: The map, the kill streak, and a button to switch server (like the Undercast Client for OCN).
replies.body_tagged: The map, the kill streak, and a button to switch server (like the Undercast Client for OCN).

replies.body: That would be great also add on durability too
replies.body_tagged: That would be great also add on durability too

replies.body: Yes, Armor Effect HUD and Potion Effect HUD.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, Armor Effect HUD and Potion Effect HUD.
